funfacts.title: Fun Facts About Persian Language
funfacts.description: Discover fascinating facts about Persian, one of the world's oldest and most beautiful languages.

items.title: Ancient Heritage
items.content: Persian (Farsi) has over 2,500 years of written history, making it one of the world's oldest living languages.

items.title: Poetic Language
items.content: Persian literature has produced world-renowned poets like Rumi, Hafez, and Ferdowsi, influencing literature globally.

items.title: Modern Evolution
items.content: While preserving its ancient roots, modern Persian incorporates many loanwords from French, English, and Turkish.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Get answers to common questions about English to Persian translation.

items.question: How accurate is the English to Persian translation?
items.answer: Our AI-powered translator provides over 95% accuracy for general content, with even higher precision for common phrases and sentences.

items.question: Can I translate entire documents?
items.answer: Yes, you can upload various document formats including PDF, Word, and text files for translation.

items.question: Is the service free to use?
items.answer: We offer both free and premium plans. The free version has daily limits, while premium plans offer unlimited translations.

items.question: How do you handle formal and informal Persian?
items.answer: Our translator can handle both formal and informal Persian, automatically detecting context or allowing you to choose the appropriate tone.

items.question: Can I use this for professional translations?
items.answer: While our tool is highly accurate, for legal or official documents, we recommend professional human translation services.
